current_merchants.notes: Perfect fit for SLC Trips (travel accommodations). Also strong fit for Pipeline IQ - construction crews need hotel bookings for job sites. Commission: 4%. Should expand with pipelineiq-* campaigns for team travel.
Excellent for SLC Trips tours and activities. Commission: 8-10%. Currently only SLC Trips; could expand to Fanon (movie location tours) but lower priority.

Universal merchant - fits ALL buildings but lacks campaign attribution (single tag). Commission: 1-10% depending on category. Critical gap: need building-specific tracking. Should implement sub-ID tracking or separate tags per building for proper attribution to city_metrics.
Niche camping/outdoor seating. Good for hiking/camping content on SLC Trips. Commission: typically 5-8% on AWIN. Moderate fit - not essential but adds variety to outdoor gear recommendations.
Outdoor gear (portable pumps, camping accessories). Decent fit for adventure/camping content. Commission: likely 5-8%. Similar to Sitpack - nice to have for gear roundups but not core.

Camera/photography cleaning gear. Weak fit for SLC Trips (unless photography-focused travel content). STRONG fit for Fanon Movies (filmmaking gear). Commission: 5-10%. Should prioritize fanon-* campaigns over travel.
Private tour guides - excellent fit for premium travel content on SLC Trips. Commission: typically 10-15% on tour bookings. Higher AOV than Viator. Should prioritize setting env var and promoting.

Direct competitor to Viator - tours and activities. Commission: 8%. Currently disabled; should enable as alternative to Viator for comparison/availability. Having both gives users options and increases conversion.

No affiliate program - UTM tracking only. Useful for local business recommendations but generates no direct revenue. Keep for SEO/content value but don't prioritize. Rock Salt could use for venue discovery but same issue.

top_recommendations: REI Co-op via AWIN (outdoor gear, 5% commission, perfect for hiking/camping content)
Rental Cars (Budget/Avis on AWIN, 3-5% commission, fills gap for road trip content)
World Nomads travel insurance (10-15% commission, high-value upsell for international content)
Backcountry via CJ (outdoor gear, 6-8% commission, complements REI)
Airbnb referral program (direct, $25-50 per signup, alternative to hotels)

missing: Streaming services (Spotify, Apple Music - limited affiliate options)
top_recommendations: Sweetwater via ShareASale (music gear, 3-5% commission, essential for artist audience)
StubHub via CJ (concert tickets, 5-7% commission, perfect for show promotions)
Plugin Boutique via ShareASale (audio plugins, 10-20% commission, high margins)
Reverb via direct program (used gear, 5% commission, musician marketplace)
Splice via direct (samples/plugins, 20-30% recurring, SaaS model)

missing: SaaS tools (OpenAI, Anthropic - no affiliate programs yet)
top_recommendations: Udemy via Rakuten (AI courses, 15-20% commission, huge course catalog)
Coursera via direct (AI certifications, 20-45% commission, high-value courses)
DigitalOcean via direct (cloud hosting, $25-50 per referral, recurring credits)
O'Reilly Media via direct (tech books/learning, 10-15% commission)
DataCamp via ShareASale (data science learning, 30% commission)
ExpressVPN via direct (privacy education, 30-40% commission, high conversion)
1Password via direct (school security, 25% recurring, B2B pricing)
Teachers Pay Teachers via direct (curriculum, 10% commission, teacher-focused)
Canva Pro via direct (school design tools, 30% recurring, widely used in education)
NordVPN via CJ (alternative to ExpressVPN, 30-40% commission)
Home Depot Pro via AWIN (tools/equipment, 2-5% commission, massive catalog)
Lowe's via CJ (construction supplies, 2-4% commission, alternative to HD)
Safety Glasses USA via ShareASale (PPE, 8-10% commission, recurring orders)
Monday.com via direct (project management, 20-30% recurring, SaaS upsell)
Grainger via direct (industrial supplies, 2-5% commission, B2B pricing)
Canva Pro via direct (design automation, 30% recurring, SMB sweet spot)
Buffer via direct (social scheduling, 20-30% recurring, core use case)
Descript via direct (video editing, 25% recurring, AI-powered)
Mailchimp via direct (email marketing, 15-25% recurring, standard tool)
Hootsuite via direct (social management, 20% recurring, enterprise option)
B&H Photo via direct (camera gear, 1-4% commission, industry standard)
Adorama via ShareASale (film equipment, 2-4% commission, B&H alternative)
MasterClass via direct (filmmaking courses, 30% commission, high-value)
Criterion Collection via direct (classic films, 10% commission, cinephile audience)
Fandango via CJ (movie tickets, 5-8% commission, direct conversion)

new_merchant_recommendations.rationale: Essential outdoor retailer for hiking/camping content. Trusted brand, wide catalog, seasonal sales. Perfect for gear guides and trip preparation content.
Largest online music gear retailer. Essential for Rock Salt artist audience. Huge catalog of instruments, recording gear, pro audio. Sweetwater is THE name in music retail.
Major online learning platform with extensive AI/ML course catalog. Certificates from top universities. Perfect for Adult AI Academy audience seeking credentials.
Leading VPN service, perfect fit for Ask Before You App's privacy focus. High commission, excellent conversion rate, schools increasingly interested in privacy tools.
Essential design tool for SMBs. Automation Studio audience needs graphics for social media. Recurring revenue model, high adoption, widely used.
Industry-leading camera and filmmaking equipment retailer. Perfect for Fanon Movies filmmaking content. Huge catalog, trusted brand, pro-level gear.
Essential for Pipeline IQ construction audience. Tools, equipment, materials. Pro program for contractors. Massive catalog, frequent purchases.
Major ticket resale marketplace. Perfect for Rock Salt concert promotions and music events. High AOV, good commission, direct conversion from content to ticket sales.
Massive course marketplace with thousands of AI/tech courses. Lower-cost alternative to Coursera. Frequent sales make conversion easier. Good for budget-conscious learners.
Largest audio plugin retailer. Essential for Rock Salt producer/recording audience. High margins, frequent sales, lower AOV but high conversion.
Leading travel insurance for international trips. High-value upsell for adventure travel content. Good commission, relatively low competition in content space.
Popular social media scheduling tool. Perfect for Automation Studio audience. Recurring revenue, affordable pricing, widely recommended.
Celebrity-taught courses including filmmaking (Martin Scorsese, Spike Lee, etc.). Perfect for Fanon Movies audience. High production value, aspirational brand.
Leading used music gear marketplace. Great for budget-conscious musicians. Complements Sweetwater (new gear). Owned by Etsy, trusted platform.
Premium outdoor gear retailer. Complements REI with higher-end brands. Good for gear reviews and premium content. Expert gearheads trust Backcountry.

rock_salt_affiliate_types.notes: Primary music gear retailer - instruments, recording equipment, pro audio. Commission: 3-5%
Used/vintage gear marketplace. Lower commission (5%) but fills budget-conscious segment
Spotify has no public affiliate program. Use referral links for artist pages but expect no commission
Apple Music affiliate program via Apple Services. Low commission (~2-5%) but worth tracking
Major ticket resale platform. 5-7% commission. Primary ticket affiliate
Alternative to StubHub. Similar commission structure
Artist merchandise platform. 10-15% commission on band merch
Audio plugins and software. High margins (10-20%), popular with producers
Sample library subscription. 20-30% recurring commission. SaaS model
